mapper.select: select count(*) from tb_comments where tb_num = #{tb_num}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_comments (reply_reg_num, reply_parent_reg_num, tb_num, content, create_user) values (seq_tb_comments.nextval, 1, #{tb_num}, #{content}, #{create_user})
mapper.update: update tb_comments set content = #{content} where reply_reg_num = #{reply_reg_num}
mapper.delete: update tb_comments set del = 'Y' where reply_reg_num = #{reply_reg_num}
